page.title: 02 ASH PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: In{Ash School}there are three classes. Each class is in a seperate building. There is an old stone building,139 years old ,and two portable buildings, one ten and one five years old. There are four teachers,three full-time and one part_time.Mrs Starks has been here ten years,Miss Taylor 2 years,Mrs Guttridge ten years and Mr Fazakerly eight years.Mr Fazakerly is headmaster.There are 7 non_teaching staff,2 dining assistants,2 diner helpers,one school assistant,one caretaker and a secretary. There are 77 children in the school.The school uniform is white,red and grey. The special events in the school are the christmas party,the christmas plays,sports day and various church services and outings. o
